references.reason: This paper is important as it introduces visual instruction tuning, a key technique used in vision-language models.

references.paper_title: Retrieval-augmented generation for large language models: A survey
references.reason: This survey paper is important for providing a comprehensive overview of retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), a technique heavily used in this paper.

references.paper_title: Colbert: Efficient and effective passage search via contextualized late interaction over bert
references.reason: This paper introduces ColBERT, a crucial method used for textual retrieval in the described MDocAgent framework.

references.paper_title: Qwen2-vl: Enhancing vision-language model's perception of the world at any resolution
references.reason: This paper presents the Qwen2-VL model, which is used as the base model in MDocAgent for various agents.

references.paper_title: Retrieval-augmented generation for knowledge-intensive nlp tasks
references.reason: This paper presents the retrieval augmented generation that helps to improve performance of language models.
